front.title: ALTO Deployment Considerations: Configuration and Monitoring by ISPs

abstract.t: As ALTO specification continues in the ALTO Working Group and someapplications start to conduct integration with ALTO, more ISPs startto evaluate key issues in the deployment of ALTO in their networks.In this document, we discuss key issues that an ISP needs to considerwhen deploying ALTO. In particular, we disucss issues on how toconfigure ALTO information as well as how to monitor theeffectiveness of ALTO.
